Package SpaceShipsAndCalculation

Class SpaceShipsOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceShipsAndCalculation.SpaceShipsOperations
  • public class SpaceShipsOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    The SpaceShipOperation class Collect all the Star Wars spaceship available from the API https://swapi.co/ and return all the information from them encapsulated in the object ResupplyPerSpaceShipPerDistance and also it calculates how many resupply is needed for a given distance on MGLT

      • individualCalculationResupply

        private java.lang.String individualCalculationResupply​(java.lang.String[] valuesConsumables,
                                                       java.lang.String mglt,
                                                       int Distance,
                                                       int hours)
        Function to calculate the qty of resupply based on the distance on MGLT, MGLT per hour and consumable resistance.
        Parameters:
        valuesConsumables - consumables splited by qty
        mglt - MGLT star ship can cover in hourd
        Distance - distance to cover on MGLT
        hours - time spca ship can travle without repo
        Returns:
        All the start ships available one the API
